original_text: even when we were dead in our trespasses, made us alive together with Christ—by grace you have been saved—
korean_text: 허물로 죽은 우리를 그리스도와 함께 살리셨고 (너희는 은혜로 구원을 받은 것이라)

sentences.original_text: even when we were dead in our trespasses
made us alive together with Christ
by grace you have been saved
